alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 6:23PM EDT until March 18 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR BAY...SOUTHEASTERN WALTON AND SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 523 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Vernon to near Panama City Beach, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Ebro, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Bennett, Porter Lake, Brannonville, Millville, West Bay and Gulf Lagoon Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
